text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir manam Moses Osirizir Arazitamɨn kuragh egh suam, a pura bizim, egh kamaghɨra igharaz darazi men sure damuva, gumazir kamaghɨn amim, God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn an ziam bar gɨn ikiam. Eghtɨma gumazir manam Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangɨva egh kamaghɨra ua igharaz darazir men sure damutɨ me an mɨn arazir kabar gɨn mangɨtɨ, gumazir kamaghɨn amizim, God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam, a ziar bar ekiam iniam.
